CustomField.description: This field is being used in Secondary Sales Plumbing report.
CustomField.formula: SECONDARY_SALES_UPVC__c + SECONDARY_SALES_CPVC__c + SECONDARY_SALES_SWR__c + SECONDARY_SALES_SILENT_SWR__c + SECONDARY_SALES_COLUMN__c + SECONDARY_SALES_V4__c + SECONDARY_SALES_NEW_PRODUCT__c
CustomField.label: Total Secondary Sales Target in Lacs
